name: AVOutputSettingsAssistant
desc: An object that builds audio and video output settings dictionaries.

items.name: init?(preset: AVOutputSettingsPreset)
items.desc: Creates an output setting assistant with a preset configuration.

items.name: struct AVOutputSettingsPreset
items.desc: A structure that defines preset configurations for an output settings assistant.

items.name: class func availableOutputSettingsPresets() -> [AVOutputSettingsPreset]
items.desc: Returns an array of preset values to use to initialize an output settings assistant.

items.name: var outputFileType: AVFileType
items.desc: A uniform type identifier (UTI) that indicates the type of file to write.

items.name: var sourceAudioFormat: CMAudioFormatDescription?
items.desc: The format of the source audio data.

items.name: var sourceVideoFormat: CMVideoFormatDescription?
items.desc: The format of the source video data.

items.name: var sourceVideoMinFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: A time value that describes the minimum frame duration of the video data.

items.name: var sourceVideoAverageFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: A time value that describes the average frame duration of the video data.
